name: First Flight (DefectiveMelon, kvebox, Jhonys L. de Oliveira)
name_original: First Flight (DefectiveMelon, kvebox, Jhonys L. de Oliveira)
description:
A puzzle game where you redirect gravity to help a little bird get out of a nest.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49 

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys To Change Direction Of Gravity

R To Reset

CTRL+Z To Undo

CTRL + Y To redo

Created by:
Tyler (@DefectiveMelon) - Programming/Sound

Victoria (@kvebox) - Art

Jhonys (@Jhonys) - Programming
